article_content: TORONTO During the free agent negotiations that brought Jack Morris to the Toronto Blue Jays in December 1991  the ace right hander and general manager Pat Gillick hardly spoke  For years  the two had been fierce rivals  one fronting the Detroit Tigers  pitch   5125 chars
